Module com.simulator.hospital
Package com.simulator.hospital.view

Class ResultViewControl

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.hospital.view.ResultViewControl
public class ResultViewControl extends Object
Controller for the Result View of the hospital simulator. Handles the display and interaction logic for the result screen, including charts, tables, and navigation.
Author:
Tu Dinh

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the ResultViewControl and sets up the UI components. Configures table columns and initializes the bar chart with appropriate labels.

    • backButtonAction

      public void backButtonAction(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the action of clicking the back button. Switches the scene back to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouse event triggered by clicking the back button

    • setRoot

      public void setRoot(javafx.scene.Parent resultRoot)
      Sets the root node for the result view scene.
      Parameters:
      resultRoot - the root node for the scene

    • setResults

      public void setResults(double avgWaitTime, List<Integer> customerCount, List<Double> utilization)
      Sets and displays the results data in the charts and labels.
      Parameters:
      avgWaitTime - the average waiting time
      customerCount - the list of customer counts per station
      utilization - the list of utilization percentages per station

    • setTable

      public void setTable(int registers, int generals, int specialists, double avgRegister, double avgGeneral, double avgSpecialist)
      Populates the table with service data.
      Parameters:
      registers - the number of register desks
      generals - the number of general examination points
      specialists - the number of specialist examination points
      avgRegister - the average utilization of register desks
      avgGeneral - the average utilization of general examination points
      avgSpecialist - the average utilization of specialist examination points

    • display

      public void display(double avgWaitTime, List<Integer> customerCount, List<Double> utilization, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Displays the result view on the specified stage.
      Parameters:
      avgWaitTime - the average waiting time
      customerCount - the list of customer counts
      utilization - the list of utilization percentages
      stage - the stage to display the scene on
